abstract: Brazilian Justice Marco Aurelio Mello rules country's Congress must also consider impeachment request against Vice Pres Michel Temer while holding hearings over impeachment of Pres Dilma Rousseff; Temer was expected to assume power from Rousseff, adding additional obstacle to impeachment proceedings.
lead_paragraph: A justice on Brazil’s high court ruled that an impeachment request made against Michel Temer must be considered by Congress while it holds hearings about removing the president.

headline.main: Brazil’s Congress Must Consider Impeaching Vice President
headline.print_headline: Brazil’s Congress Must Consider Impeaching Vice President

snippet: A justice on Brazil’s high court ruled that an impeachment request made against Michel Temer must be considered by Congress while it holds hearings about removing the president.
